channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Firefox for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Firefox for Android

item.title: CVE-2023-25747|2024-08-02T11:32:12.729Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: A potential use-after-free in libaudio was fixed by disabling the AAudio backend when running on Android API below version 30. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other versions of Firefox are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 110.1.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-29540|2024-08-02T14:14:38.739Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: Using a redirect embedded into sourceMappingUrls could allow for navigation to external protocol links in sandboxed iframes without allow-top-navigation-to-custom-protocols. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29538|2024-08-02T14:14:38.627Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: Under specific circumstances a WebExtension may have received a jar:file:/// URI instead of a moz-extension:/// URI during a load request. This leaked directory paths on the user's machine. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29534|2024-08-02T14:14:38.902Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description:
Different techniques existed to obscure the fullscreen notification in Firefox and Focus for Android. These could have led to potential user confusion and spoofing attacks.
*This bug only affects Firefox and Focus for Android. Other versions of Firefox are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112 and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29547|2024-08-02T14:14:38.812Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: When a secure cookie existed in the Firefox cookie jar an insecure cookie for the same domain could have been created, when it should have silently failed. This could have led to a desynchronization in expected results when reading from the secure cookie. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29549|2024-08-02T14:14:38.794Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: Under certain circumstances, a call to the bind function may have resulted in the incorrect realm. This may have created a vulnerability relating to JavaScript-implemented sandboxes such as SES. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29551|2024-08-02T14:14:38.985Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 111. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29546|2024-08-02T14:14:38.808Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description:
When recording the screen while in Private Browsing on Firefox for Android the address bar and keyboard were not hidden, potentially leaking sensitive information.
*This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112 and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29543|2024-08-02T14:14:38.895Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: An attacker could have caused memory corruption and a potentially exploitable use-after-free of a pointer in a global object's debugger vector. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29544|2024-08-02T14:14:38.782Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: If multiple instances of resource exhaustion occurred at the incorrect time, the garbage collector could have caused memory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

item.title: CVE-2023-29537|2024-08-02T14:14:38.608Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20android
item.description: Multiple race conditions in the font initialization could have led to memory corruption and execution of attacker-controlled code. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.
